attributes.action: Run a 2nd referendum in all areas and district that voted to leave the EU.
attributes.additional_details:
Since the EU referendum, many pro-leavers have been accused of not knowing the full impact of the vote for Brexit would have on the UK.

With this in mind, we ask the government to have a final, confirmatory vote in areas which voted to leave the EU. 

If the 2nd re-vote would to indicate remain, then the UK Government should raise an additional mandate to remain, but canvas the EU parliament for fundamental changes to the structure and fundamental practices within the EU.
attributes.background: The recent referendum on the UKs membership of the EU has brought about much confusion with regard to the UKs position going forward post-referendum. The realisation by many leave voters of the enormity of such a vote has only just started to be realised by those voters and their referendum re-run.
